title: List of Paris Saint-Germain FC managers - Wikipedia
snippet: In his three seasons in charge, PSG won three Ligue 1 titles, two Coupe de France, three Coupe de la Ligue, and three Trophée des Champions. Luis Enrique is in second place, with eight trophies, including the UEFA Champions League in 2025 and ...

title: Luis Enrique - Wikipedia
snippet: Luis Enrique Martínez García (Spanish pronunciation: [lwis enˈrike maɾˈtineθ ɡaɾˈθia]; born 8 May 1970), known as Luis Enrique, is a Spanish football manager and former player. He is currently the head coach of Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germain. A versatile player with good technique, ...

title: Luis Enrique appointed Paris Saint-Germain head coach after Christophe Galtier exit - The Athletic
snippet: Paris Saint-Germain have confirmed the appointment of Luis Enrique as their new head coach. Luis Enrique succeeds Christophe Galtier, whose departure after one year in charge was announced just hours earlier on Wednesday.
